job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.
job_details.full_text:
Staff AI Compiler Engineer

As a Staff AI Compiler Engineer, you will be at the forefront of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler development. You'll be responsible for driving the technical direction, solving complex, open-ended problems, and setting priorities for high-impact projects. Your work will shape Axelera AI's software systems and extend beyond your immediate team, with a focus on delivering scalable, flexible solutions to advance our AI platform., * Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK.

     * Drive innovation by designing compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing.

     * Execute and technically guide complex projects to ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI) and upcoming generations of our heterogeneous compute platform.

     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance.

     * Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy.

     * Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers.

     * Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers, modeling a standard of excellence and leadership within the team, thereby being a valuable partner to your manager and peers.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes the development and optimization of a Neural Network compiler, focusing on hardware-aware transformations, supporting diverse workloads including generative AI, and ensuring performance and accuracy. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer, particularly in algorithm development, model optimization, and productionizing systems, even though it's at the compiler level rather than direct model building. The mention of 'generative AI' as a workload is secondary to the primary focus on compiler engineering and optimization.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves driving compiler optimizations and supporting workloads like generative AI, which directly impacts how models are executed and perform. This is a form of adapting and optimizing models for specific hardware.
job_tasks.phrase: design compiler optimizations, focusing on hardware-aware transformations for In-Memory Computing

job_tasks.justification: The job requires ensuring the compiler supports various AI workloads, including generative AI, which is a core aspect of model execution and adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: ensure our compiler supports workloads beyond classical CNNs (e.g. generative AI)

job_tasks.justification: The role is responsible for the design, architecture, and hands-on development of a Neural Network compiler and SDK, which are core software engineering activities for building AI platforms.
job_tasks.phrase: Lead the design, architecture, and hands-on development of Axelera AI's Neural Network compiler and SDK

job_tasks.justification: The job involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to optimize the software stack for scalability and performance, a key aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on technical strategy, optimizing the Axelera software stack for scalability and performance

job_tasks.justification: The role requires overseeing the compilation pipeline and proposing changes for functional coverage, performance, and accuracy, which is akin to managing and optimizing a production pipeline.
job_tasks.phrase: Oversee holistically our compilation pipeline and proactively propose changes to ensure best-in-class functional coverage, performance and accuracy

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring best practices in testing methodologies for compilers is a crucial part of maintaining the quality and reliability of the AI software stack in production.
job_tasks.phrase: Ensure best practices in the team, especially regarding testing methodologies for compilers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'solving complex, open-ended problems' and 'driving the technical direction' implies deep engagement with the challenges of making AI models run efficiently, which is a modeling-related task at the compiler level.
The role involves setting priorities for high-impact projects and shaping the company's software systems, indicating an understanding of business goals and strategic technical direction.
The phrase 'advance our AI platform' suggests a focus on contributing to the company's overall strategic goals in AI.

soft_skills.phrase: Ensure best practices in the team
Mentor and guide junior and senior engineers
modeling a standard of excellence and leadership
valuable partner to your manager and peers
